japanese: いいだろう。/本番に影響ない程度なら、/練習にもなるからね。
english: Fine. /As long as it doesn't hurt the real thing, /it's good practice.

japanese: いいんですか？/じゃ、遠慮なく。/パクッ！
english: Is it okay? /Then don't mind if I do. /Chomp！

japanese: いいカメラだと取材してても/気分がいいわ。
english: A good camera makes /covering events feel good.

japanese: あー、それってヒドい言い方。
english: Ah, that's a harsh way to say it.

japanese: いいんですよ。/流先輩はそのままで！
english: It's fine./Nagare-senpai is fine as is！

japanese: あーん、こういうときは、/ウソでも「任せとけ」とかいうんですぅ！
english: Aww, at times like this,/say 'leave it to me' even if it's a lie！

japanese: いいお天気になってよかったわ。/正直、これだけが心配だったの。
english: I'm glad the weather cleared. /Honestly, that was my only worry.

japanese: いいの。気にしないで。/例えばの話なんだから。
english: It's fine. Don't worry. /It's just hypothetical.

japanese: いいわよねぇ、学園祭って！/血が騒ぐわね！
english: Festivals are great!/Gets the blood pumping!

japanese: いい天気ですね！/醍醐先輩！
いいね！　一緒に行こうよ！/全部のお店を回りたい気分！
english: Nice！ Let's go together！/I wanna hit all the shops！

japanese: いいね！　一緒に行こう！/全部の店を回りたい気分だな！
english: Nice！ Let's go together！/I wanna hit all the shops！

japanese: いいよ。/持っていくだけで判るんだろ？/なら、任しといて。
english: Fine. /You'll know when you take it?/Then leave it to me.

japanese: いいんですよ。/流さんはそのままで！
english: It's fine./Nagare-san is fine as is!

japanese: いい加減にしないと、/痛い目みるよ！
english: If you don't stop,/you'll be sorry！
